column3: I'm afraid you missed the window for this PR by 2 months and 24 days.\n

While this is advertised (e.g. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=665191.0) as a decentralized redlist proposal what is actually does is quite different— it polls a hard coded URL and blocks whatever it returns, an overtly centralized mechanism.\n\nEven the few fringe people with a poor understanding of the important of fungibility as a social fiction (— which is all it is even for classic fo

Incidentally, I coined the term "redlist" exactly so we could talk about a _very different_ system than this. It's quite annoying to see you take that term and use it to mean blacklisting, did the term blacklist not appeal or something? Please don't mis-appropriate terminology like that in future, these discussions are complex enough without people deliberately muddying the waters by redefining te
